### Dokumentation

Newsweek published in march 2021 the third ranking of the world's best hospitals. The survey was conducted by Statista Inc. in 25 countries with around 2000 hospitals.

This page shows the comparison of Swiss hospitals with surrounding countries and North America.

The current Stata article can be found [here](https://www.newsweek.com/best-hospitals-2021) - and for [2020](https://www.newsweek.com/best-hospitals-2020) and [2019](https://www.newsweek.com/best-hospitals-2019)
